00019 #ifndef _NET_PBM_HPP_cm101026_
00020 #define _NET_PBM_HPP_cm101026_
00021 
00022 #include <iostream>
00023 #include <fstream>
00024 #include <stdexcept>
00025 #include <string>
00026 #include <vector>
00027 
00028 #include <boost/format.hpp>
00029 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00030 #include <boost/noncopyable.hpp>
00031 #include <boost/filesystem.hpp>
00032 #include <boost/filesystem/fstream.hpp>
00033 
00034 #include "logging.hpp"
00035 
00036 namespace netpbm {
00037   class pgm_writer : private boost::noncopyable {
00038   public:
00039     typedef std::vector<std::string> string_vector;
00040     typedef boost::shared_ptr<pgm_writer> sptr;
00041 
00042     pgm_writer(size_t width,
00043                boost::filesystem::fstream& os) 
00044       : file_exists_(true)
00045       , os_(os)
00046       , width_(width)
00047       , height_(0)
00048       , need_height_update_(false) {}
00049     
00050     boost::filesystem::fstream& write_header() {
00051       write_str("P5\n");
00052       write_str(str(boost::format("%9d")  % width_));
00053       height_pos_= os_.tellp();
00054       write_str(str(boost::format(" %9d\n")  % height_));
00055       write_str("255\n");
00056       return os_;
00057     }
00058 
00059     boost::filesystem::fstream& read_header() {
00060       os_.seekp(0, std::ios::beg);
00061       std::string pgm_magic; os_ >> pgm_magic;
00062       ASSERT_THROW(pgm_magic == "P5");
00063       size_t width; os_ >> width;
00064       ASSERT_THROW(width == width_);
00065       height_pos_= os_.tellg();
00066       os_ >> height_;
00067       os_.seekp(0, std::ios::end);
00068       return os_;
00069     }    
00070 
00071     ~pgm_writer() {
00072       update_height();
00073     }
00074     
00075     size_t width() const { return width_; }
00076     size_t height() const { return height_; }
00077     
00078     bool write_line(std::string s, bool perform_height_update=false) {
00079       if (!os_ || s.size() != width_) return false;
00080       if (not write_str(s, false)) return false;
00081       ++height_;
00082       need_height_update_= true;
00083       if (perform_height_update)
00084         update_height();
00085       return true;
00086     }
00087     
00088   private:
00089     void update_height() {
00090       if (not need_height_update_) return;
00091       os_.seekp(height_pos_, std::ios::beg);
00092       write_str(str(boost::format(" %9d\n")  % height_));
00093       os_.seekp(0, std::ios::end);
00094       need_height_update_= false;
00095     }
00096     
00097     bool write_str(std::string s, bool throw_on_error=true) { 
00098       bool success(false);
00099       try {
00100         success= os_.write(s.c_str(), s.size());
00101       } catch (const std::runtime_error& error) {
00102         if (throw_on_error) throw error; else return false;
00103       }
00104       if (throw_on_error && not success) 
00105         throw std::runtime_error(THROW_SITE_INFO("write_str failed"));
00106       return success;
00107     }
00108 
00109     const bool file_exists_;
00110     boost::filesystem::fstream& os_;
00111     const size_t width_;
00112     size_t height_;
00113     std::ostream::streampos height_pos_;
00114     bool need_height_update_;
00115   } ;
00116     
00117 } // namespace netpbm
00118 
00119 #endif // _NET_PBM_HPP_cm101026_
